name: 渠道跟踪和营销扩展查询模板字典
description: 渠道跟踪、渠道追踪、AI记忆备份、资源记忆等渠道营销扩展功能相关表的查询模板

渠道类型统计.sql: SELECT channel_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM channel_trackings GROUP BY channel_type ORDER BY count DESC

渠道来源统计.sql: SELECT channel_source, COUNT(*) as count FROM channel_trackings GROUP BY channel_source ORDER BY count DESC

渠道转化统计.sql: SELECT channel_type, COUNT(*) as total_visits, COUNT(CASE WHEN conversion_status = 'converted' THEN 1 END) as conversions FROM channel_trackings GROUP BY channel_type ORDER BY conversions DESC

渠道效果分析.sql: SELECT channel_type, AVG(engagement_score) as avg_engagement, MAX(engagement_score) as max_engagement FROM channel_trackings WHERE engagement_score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY channel_type ORDER BY avg_engagement DESC

渠道追踪记录总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM channel_tracking
渠道追踪记录总数.description: 查询渠道追踪记录总数
渠道追踪记录总数.response: 渠道追踪记录总数为{count}条

追踪状态统计.sql: SELECT tracking_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM channel_tracking GROUP BY tracking_status ORDER BY count DESC

追踪渠道统计.sql: SELECT tracking_channel, COUNT(*) as count FROM channel_tracking GROUP BY tracking_channel ORDER BY count DESC

追踪事件统计.sql: SELECT tracking_event, COUNT(*) as count FROM channel_tracking GROUP BY tracking_event ORDER BY count DESC

今日渠道追踪.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM channel_tracking WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURDATE()
今日渠道追踪.description: 查询今日渠道追踪数量

记忆类型备份统计.sql: SELECT memory_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM ai_memories_backup_20250820 GROUP BY memory_type ORDER BY count DESC
记忆类型备份统计.description: 统计AI记忆类型备份分布
记忆类型备份统计.response: 记忆类型备份统计完成

记忆重要性备份统计.sql: SELECT importance_level, COUNT(*) as count FROM ai_memories_backup_20250820 GROUP BY importance_level ORDER BY importance_level DESC
记忆重要性备份统计.description: 统计AI记忆重要性备份分布
记忆重要性备份统计.response: 记忆重要性备份统计完成

记忆状态备份统计.sql: SELECT memory_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM ai_memories_backup_20250820 GROUP BY memory_status ORDER BY count DESC
记忆状态备份统计.description: 统计AI记忆状态备份分布
记忆状态备份统计.response: 记忆状态备份统计完成

资源记忆总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM resource_memories

资源类型统计.sql: SELECT resource_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM resource_memories GROUP BY resource_type ORDER BY count DESC

资源状态统计.sql: SELECT resource_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM resource_memories GROUP BY resource_status ORDER BY count DESC

资源访问统计.sql: SELECT AVG(access_count) as avg_access, MAX(access_count) as max_access FROM resource_memories WHERE access_count IS NOT NULL

渠道营销扩展概览.sql: SELECT 'channel_trackings' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM channel_trackings UNION ALL SELECT 'channel_tracking' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM channel_tracking UNION ALL SELECT 'ai_memories_backup_20250820' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM ai_memories_backup_20250820 UNION ALL SELECT 'resource_memories' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM resource_memories
渠道营销扩展概览.description: 渠道营销扩展系统数据总览
渠道营销扩展概览.response: 渠道营销扩展概览查询完成
